entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:08 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 08:53 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this morning. Rain mixed with wet snow near noon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 09:03 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level 900 metres. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 09:03 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Snow level 800 metres rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 09:03 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 09:03 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 09:03 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
